When President Obama bowed to the King of Arabia and went about the world telling how rotton the U.S.A is he lost all respect as far as I am concerned! Now the liberals on this board have displayed contempt for President Bush for many years and have showed contempt for Gov. Palin and worst of all total contempt for American War Hero, 25 Year congressman Senator John McCain! I have NO RESPECT FOR PRESIDENT OBAMA AND I STATE THIS OPENLY! aww chiefy it sounds like someone licked all the green off your sucker.
reply: yup ya did cept what ya got wasn't green
